thread.section_title: Trekkinn.com opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Trekkinn.com | www.trekkinn.com
thread.title: Andrew French

author: Andrew French
title: Andrew French
text: I accidentally gave this company the wrong email address and wrong shipping address do to a visual impairment. I am trying to correct the problem. I have sent them 3 emails with no response. I cannot contact them through their website without the incorrect email address that I gave them. Which I do not have. If your company reads this, please email me. A. French.
